content: निवृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To come back, return; न च निम्नादिव सलिलं निवर्तते मे ततो हृदयं <ls>Ś. 3. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 30</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 40</ls>; <ls>Bg. 8. 21</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">15. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To flee from, retreat; <ls>Bk. 5. 102.</ls> {@--3@} To turn away from, be averse to; <ls>R. 5. 23</ls>; <ls n="R.">7. 61.</ls> {@--4@} To cease, desist or abstain from; प्रसमीक्ष्य निवर्तेत सर्वमांसस्य भक्षणात् <ls>Ms. 5. 49</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">1. 53</ls>; <ls>Bk. 1. 18</ls>; निवृत्तमांसस्तु जनकः <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--5@} To be freed or absolved from, to escape; <ls>Bg. 1. 39.</ls> {@--6@} To leave off speaking, cease, stop. {@--7@} To be removed, come to an end, cease, disappear; <ls>Bg. 2. 59</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">14. 22</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 185</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">186.</ls> {@--8@} To be accomplished or finished, come to an end. {@--9@} To be withheld or withdrawn from. {@--10@} To refuse, decline. {@--11@} To be engaged in. {@--12@} To be reversed. {@--13@} To set (as the sun). {@--14@} To be forbidden. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to return, send back; <ls>R. 2. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 47</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 44.</ls> {@--2@} To withdraw, keep away from; turn away, divert; <ls>R. 2. 28</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 11.</ls> {@--3@} To accomplish, perform, finish, complete.
